import { Pieces, Cells, Promotion, Notation, NextMoves, CheckIndicator, HiglightedMoves, } from './Components/' import useCheckSituation from './Components/Pieces/Logic/King activity/Check situation' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' export default function Chess() { const { gameField } = useSelector((store) => store.chess) const checkSituation = useCheckSituation() useEffect(checkSituation, [gameField]) return (
) }
